songs.title: Boyfriend
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah, Weekly 16's
Bieber? Uh!

[Verse]
You got the face of an angel, and ya body lookin too thick
Ya heart's broken baby look I got the gluestick
I love 2 things money and my music
But I would trade it all if you say you'll be my new chic
Swag, nah fuck that swag shit
Turn my remix up and let the club get ratchet
My girl don't smoke, if you puff just pass it
She don't like smog, but she love that Traphik
Yeah!

[Hook]
I'd like to be everything you want
Hey girl, let me talk to you
If I was your boyfriend, I'd never let you go
Keep you on my arm girl, you’d never be alone
I can be a gentleman, anything you want
If I was your boyfriend, I’d never let you go, I’d never let you go
